name.en: Case 4. Secretary Service Straight to You
name.jp: Case 4. Secretary Service Straight to You

desc.en: While handling some overdue tasks at Schale, Sensei wishes aloud for some coffee and Akane suddenly appears, granting their wish. Sensei and Akane have a heart-to-heart, which helps Akane feel confident in herself again.
desc.jp: While handling some overdue tasks at Schale, Sensei wishes aloud for some coffee and Akane suddenly appears, granting their wish. Sensei and Akane have a heart-to-heart, which helps Akane feel confident in herself again.
desc.zh_cn: 工作到很晚的老师自言自语说要喝咖啡时，{cf朱音}递出了咖啡。尽管因为没想到她会在这里而感到惊慌，老师依然收下了咖啡，并向{cf朱音}询问最近一直打扮成兔女郎的理由。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Asuna shows up to do some volunteer work to show her gratitude. Nothing about Asuna's behavior seems out of the ordinary, but she reveals a different side of herself in the end.
desc.jp: Asuna shows up to do some volunteer work to show her gratitude. Nothing about Asuna's behavior seems out of the ordinary, but she reveals a different side of herself in the end.
desc.zh_cn: 为了答谢而前来提供服务的{cf明日奈}。{cf明日奈}的样子一如往常，但最后却发现她异于平常的一面。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: While Sensei is working a late night at Schale, Hibiki visits wearing a cheerleader costume to provide Sensei a little extra motivation. Hibiki cheers Sensei on enthusiastically, but soon realizes that something is wrong.
desc.jp: While Sensei is working a late night at Schale, Hibiki visits wearing a cheerleader costume to provide Sensei a little extra motivation. Hibiki cheers Sensei on enthusiastically, but soon realizes that something is wrong.
desc.zh_cn: 在{et夏莱}加班到很晚的某一天，{cf响}为了帮老师加油，穿着啦啦队服来到{et夏莱}。虽然{cf响}在办公室很热情地帮老师加油，但她很快就发现自己做错了。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: 小雪偷偷潛入夏萊想要調查各種秘密，但卻被老師發現了。逃跑的小雪奔向老師的居住區，在那邊發現了奇怪的書。
desc.jp: 小雪偷偷潛入夏萊想要調查各種秘密，但卻被老師發現了。逃跑的小雪奔向老師的居住區，在那邊發現了奇怪的書。
desc.zh_cn: {cf小雪}偷偷潜入{et夏莱}想要调查各种秘密，但却被老师发现了。逃跑的{cf小雪}奔向老师的居住区，在那边发现了奇怪的书。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: The 104th track in Blue Archive OST, famously known for its usage in Miyu's recollection lobby.

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第105首曲子，因被用于美游的会议大厅而出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Serina goes to Schale to tend to Sensei who is working late into the night.
desc.jp: Serina goes to Schale to tend to Sensei who is working late into the night.
desc.zh_cn: 老师在{et夏莱}工作到深夜，因此{cf芹奈}便跑来照料老师。

hobby.zh_cn_cn: 看护病人、参加志愿服务

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

hobby.zh_cn_cn: 看护病人、参加志愿服务

desc.en: Sensei is working away in Schale when Yuzu runs in, looking upset. She ran away from the part-time job Sensei helped her get when she realized it was at a maid cafe. To help Yuzu find the courage to face her job, Sensei offers to give her maid lessons.
desc.jp: Sensei is working away in Schale when Yuzu runs in, looking upset. She ran away from the part-time job Sensei helped her get when she realized it was at a maid cafe. To help Yuzu find the courage to face her job, Sensei offers to give her maid lessons.
desc.zh_cn: 在{et夏莱}从容办公的老师。过了一会儿，传来了急促的脚步声，{cf柚子}哭丧着表情来到了{et夏莱}。听过原委后，她明白老师安排的打工是女仆咖啡厅，接着便逃离了咖啡厅。老师为了让{cf柚子}能适应打工环境，于是提议进行女仆特训。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
